synopsis.text:
His name is Kiteretsu, a young, elementary school-aged boy with an extraordinary mind for science and invention. Inspired by a centuries-old encyclopedia penned by his ancestor, the legendary inventor Kiteretsusai, Kiteretsu brings to life a robot companion, Korosuke, using the advanced technology detailed within the book's pages.

Join Kiteretsu and his friends on thrilling time-traveling escapades, made possible by the ingenious time machine he built. Among his circle is Miyoko, the sweet neighborhood girl who holds a special place in his heart, and Tongari, his friendly rival who shares striking similarities with Honekawa Suneo. Buta Gorilla, the local bully, often finds himself at odds with Korosuke, adding an extra layer of excitement to their grade-school adventures.

While the English dub has been confirmed to air on the Indian TV channel Pogo, the series may have also graced screens in other Asian countries or on different channels. Don't miss out on the chance to follow the incredible journey of Kiteretsu and his friends as they explore the wonders of time and technology!
